og:title.description: The title of your object as it should appear within the graph, e.g., "The Rock".

og:type.description: The type of your object, e.g., "video.movie". Depending on the type you specify, other properties may also be required.

og:image.description: An image URL which should represent your object within the graph.

og:url.description: The canonical URL of your object that will be used as its permanent ID in the graph, e.g., "https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117500/".
